description:
Athena has summoned all the Saints for an important announcement as the four kings appear in front of Pallas to grant her every wish.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`Apparition des quatre grands généraux, la guerre est déclarée entre Athéna et Pallas !
Shitennou Arawaru! Athena Tai Pallas Zenmen Taiketsu!
The Four Kings Appear! Full-Scale War between Athena and Pallas!
四天王現わる! アテナ対パラス全面対決!
